name: the secret of dyes
description:
Special instructions - 1
This game is a puzzle solving game based on three primary colors of dye, so it may not be friendly to people with weak color and color blindness, so let me know in advance!

Special instructions - 2
In my game experience, I have not found any games with such settings. If there is no similar puzzle design, then I may be the first to have this idea. If there are similar games, I hereby declare that I did not plagiarize them.

  • Contains 35 levels, the first ten levels of the game is the introduction of rules.
  • At least ten beautiful background music.
  • Different styles of the scene sky.
